statements: SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE hotel_id = 1
SELECT hotel_id, occupancy_rate, room_price FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE check_in_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy ORDER BY room_price DESC
SELECT hotel_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE occupancy_rate > 0.8
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM hotel_occupancy
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE occupancy_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY room_price DESC;
SELECT hotel_id, AVG(occupancy_rate) AS avg_occupancy, MAX(room_price) AS max_price FROM hotel_occupancy GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING avg_occupancy > 0.6;
SELECT hotel_id, room_price, DATEDIFF(check_out_date, check_in_date) AS stay_duration FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE stay_duration > 3 ORDER BY stay_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY hotel_id ASC, check_in_date ASC;
SELECT hotel_id, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM hotel_occupancy GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING total_bookings > 5 ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy;
SELECT hotel_id, occupancy_rate FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE occupancy_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM pricing_trends WHERE price < 100;
SELECT hotel_id, AVG(occupancy_rate) AS avg_occupancy FROM hotel_occupancy GROUP BY hotel_id;
SELECT hotel_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM pricing_trends GROUP BY hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy ORDER BY occupancy_rate DESC, occupancy_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM pricing_trends WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT hotel_id, SUM(occupancy_rate) AS total_occupancy FROM hotel_occupancy GROUP BY hotel_id HAVING total_occupancy > 50
SELECT hotel_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM pricing_trends GROUP BY hotel_id ORDER BY avg_price DESC

SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy INNER JOIN pricing_trends ON hotel_occupancy.hotel_id = pricing_trends.hotel_id WHERE hotel_occupancy.occupancy_rate < 80 AND pricing_trends.price > 150 ORDER BY hotel_occupancy.occupancy_date ASC, pricing_trends.price_date DESC
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy ORDER BY hotel_id DESC;
SELECT occupancy_rate, occupancy_date FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE occupancy_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pricing, pricing_date, hotel_id FROM pricing_trends ORDER BY pricing DESC;
SELECT decision_description FROM strategic_decision WHERE decision_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE hotel_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT hotel_id, occupancy_rate FROM hotel_occupancy WHERE occupancy_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM pricing_trends ORDER BY pricing_date DESC;
SELECT decision_description AS decision, decision_date FROM strategic_decision WHERE decision_id = 1;
SELECT hotel_id, pricing FROM pricing_trends WHERE pricing > 150 ORDER BY pricing DESC;
SELECT * FROM hotel_occupancy JOIN pricing_trends ON hotel_occupancy.hotel_id = pricing_trends.hotel_id;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotel;
SELECT * FROM room WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT room_number, room_type, price FROM room ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservation WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hotel ORDER BY hotel_name ASC, occupancy_rate DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotel WHERE occupancy_rate > 0.8;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM reservation WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_number, price, availability FROM room INNER JOIN hotel ON room.hotel_id = hotel.hotel_id WHERE hotel.location = 'New York';
SELECT room_type, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM room GROUP BY room_type HAVING COUNT(room_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotel WHERE rooms_total > 50;
SELECT * FROM room_type ORDER BY room_price DESC;
SELECT room_type_id, room_description, room_price FROM room_type WHERE room_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM booking;
SELECT * FROM hotel;
SELECT hotel_name, location FROM hotel ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM room_type WHERE room_price > 100 ORDER BY room_price ASC;
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM booking WHERE hotel_id = 1 AND room_type_id = 2;
SELECT room_description, room_price FROM room_type WHERE room_type_id = 3;
